SELECT m.meeting_id AS meetingId , m.meeting_title , u.nickname AS leaderNickName , m.date AS meetingDate , p.place_name AS meetingPlace , m.custom_place_address AS customPlaceAddress , m.latitude , m.longitude FROM friend f JOIN member u ON ( (f.requester_id = #{userId} AND f.addressee_id = u.member_id) OR (f.addressee_id = #{userId} AND f.requester_id = u.member_id) ) JOIN meeting m ON m.leader_id = u.member_id JOIN place p ON p.place_id = m.place_id WHERE f.status_id = ( SELECT status_id FROM status WHERE status_type = 'ACCEPTED') ORDER BY m.date DESC
SELECT user_id , point_balance AS totalPoints FROM user WHERE user_id = #{ userId }
